title: Client-Crash w/ Patch 6.16 - Bugreport
body:
Dear Riot Team,
with Patch 6.16 you changed again a few things [like you´re doing with every patch]
But with 6.16 you managed it to get the Client crashed [it still runs in the background]
If you start the client again, this message pops up [like starting another instance of a client]
"There is another instance of Launcher running, do you want to terminate it?"

This happens random but not that often. My friends and I had situations in the champ-select - The Client crashes, the person gets a Leaver Buster Cooldown. This isn´t very funny to deal with nor is it fair for the players who get a ban. 

I just want to tell you that - so it would be nice if you can fix this bug ASAP.

Sincerly

Nexocore - {{champion:268}}
